page.title: 02LANDSCAPE - CONTINUED
page.content: There are several locations where { {Spa}waters may be taken.The most magnificent is Pittville Pump Rooms, standing in picturesque parkland and situated near Prestbury Park - home of Cheltenham's{N.H.Race Course}where the famous{Gold Cup}is held annually. The River Chelt runs through the centre of the town (sometimes under- ground) and is clearly seen in Sandford Park and at Royal Well. Most{recent development}has occurred to the west, particularly in the St Mark's area, where the majority of the town's high-rise flats are found in the vicinity of the top-secret Government Communications Headquarters A newly opened complex "The Prince of Wales Stadium" contains indoor pools, gymnasium,saunas,outdoor running track and other sports facilities.
